content: As a required boss fight, you won't be able to miss Guangmou as you advance through the Black Wind Mountain. You'll find him halfway through the Bamboo Grove once you reach Snake Way.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Guangmou.md', within the main section titled 'Guangmou', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Guangmou'.
The content is as follows:
As a required boss fight, you won't be able to miss Guangmou as you advance through the Black Wind Mountain. You'll find him halfway through the Bamboo Grove once you reach Snake Way.
